comment._content: April 3, 1915 New York Times identifies those who arrived the day before on the Chicago from Le Havre, among them J.W.S. Brady. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A00EFD81238E633A... Here is the grave of J.W.S Brady, 1889-1965. www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=400619< He was heir to an oil fortune from his father of the same name, this 1921 biographical sketch details his accomplishments to that date:
